reviewText: Nice highlightz of the greatest show on earth

One of the better surfing films out there.  Great tube shots and clearly shows the ferocity when big swells hit shallow reefs.  The bigger the swell, the shallower the reef, the bigger the waves.  And these guys know how to ride them so damn well.
very good. Makes me want to surf more. love the doco style with plenty of good surfing footage. Gerry Lopez is the ultimate Pipe Master
